nodes.text: Arl'Toral was an ancient Coynite warrior, son of the influential leader Toral. He acted in his father's stead to further improve the welfare of Coynite society. He revised and reformed the En'Tra'Sol law system laid down by his father, eventually forming a rigid code of conduct for all to adhere to. He also established the first mercenary unit, the Mercenary Guild of Coyn. He brought peace to the once-troubled planet of Coyn.
